summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGet proactive and start targeting early signs of aging and dehydration with the Exuviance Pro-Plump Hydrating Eye Cream, formulated to visibly plump and firm the look of fine lines and wrinkles with an instant surge of moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsPlumps and firms with Hyaluronic acid to quench dry lines and wrinkles around the eye area for a boost of hydrationFills the look of fine lines with Gluconolactone to gently exfoliate and promote skin’s natural turnover processProtects skin from drying environmental aggressors with antioxidants Vitamin C, E, and Green Tea ExtractResearch ResultsAfter 4 weeks Percentage of participants noting improvement with twice daily use97% eye area looks younger, renewed97% crow’s feet wrinkles are less noticeable97% skin looks firmer/more elastic97% eye area looks less tired, revitalizedKey IngredientsPHA (Gluconolactone) - gently exfoliates to promote skin's natural turnover process, while also fading the appearance of discoloration, uneven tone and age spotsHyaluronic Acid - hydrates and visibly plumps skin to restore bounce and radianceVitamin C & E - antioxidant protects against drying environmental aggressors that could worsen uneven tone and signs of agingGreen Tea Extract - Functions as an antioxidant and moisturizes the skinFormulated with Chamomile & Calendula Extracts - plant extracts soothe and moisturize the skinItem 2634938How To UseGently apply product to the area around the eye until cream disappears. Use twice daily.For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical Assistance.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Gluconolactone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Octyldodecyl Myristate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Batyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Butylene Glycol, Anthemis Nobilis Flow er Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis, Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Ceteareth-20h, Laureth-7, Polyacrylamide, Glyceryl Stearate, Steareth-2, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently apply product to the area around the eye until cream disappears. Use twice daily.For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical Assistance.

reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Texture is pretty thick, no scent, packaging is simple, ingredients are clean and its effectiveness is good. I tried it for about two weeks and didn't see a huge difference but I did see some.

reviews.headline: Really good product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Natural ingredients and unscented. Works good, effective packaging. Great texture. Super light when wearing and not sticky. Only takes a little.

reviews.headline: love itttt
reviews.comments: love it

reviews.headline: great, get it !
reviews.comments: looooved it !! quite hydrating, definitely helped with dark undereye circles. no strong scent which i loved because im sensitive to that stuff.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really like the texture of this eye cream and how it applied to my under eyes. I did see noticeable hydration to that area under my eyes, but after using it for a few weeks I have not noticed any other benefits beyond being hydrated. The packaging is a nice little pump bottle which I liked.

reviews.headline: enriching and plumping
reviews.comments: i struggle seeing much of a difference with eye creams to begin with, so i'm probably not the best person to ask, but the product itself was lovely! it was smooth and creamy and felt really nice on my skin. it felt enriching and plumping, so definitely still a plus!

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a very nice eye cream. It goes on smoothly under makeup with no pilling. It really helps to minimize fine lines and wrinkles. I love that it has a pump so application is mess free.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and smooth
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I really like the weightless feeling of this product. Goes on smooth and creamy. Small bottle to travel with perfectly. I can tell a difference after having used it! And will certainly purchase in the future.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review

I've been using the Exuviance Pro-Plump Hydrating Eye Cream for a few weeks now, and I'm honestly so impressed! The texture is rich yet lightweight, and it absorbs beautifully without feeling greasy. I noticed almost immediately that the skin around my eyes looked more hydrated and refreshed.

Over time, it's definitely helped soften the appearance of fine lines and made my under-eye area look smoother and more plump. I love how it layers well under makeup too — no pilling or heaviness. It has a very gentle, soothing feel, which is great for my sensitive skin.

Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality eye cream that delivers both hydration and visible results!

reviews.headline: Instant Hydration for Brighter, Smoother Eyes
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The Exuviance Pro-Plump Hydrating Eye Cream has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. From the first application, it delivers an instant boost of moisture that makes my under-eye area look refreshed, plump, and noticeably smoother. I love how lightweight and fast-absorbing it is—perfect for both morning and night without interfering with makeup. After just a few weeks of consistent use, the fine lines around my eyes have visibly softened, and my skin feels firmer and more resilient. It's gentle, fragrance-free, and packed with skin-loving ingredients like hyaluronic acid, vitamins C & E, and soothing botanicals. A total win for tired or dehydrated eyes!

reviews.headline: Love it so far!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Texture is wonderful. Haven't noticed a huge change but I have also been careful with my introduction to ensure I do not have a reaction. Looking forward to seeing the effectiveness overtime. Love the airless pump and lack of fragrance.

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: This is a nice eye cream for the morning. I won't say this is life changing or anything which is why I gave it 4 stars but it does slightly diminish puffiness in the morning!

reviews.headline: Plumping Cream
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I received this product t complimentary in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own. This photo was taken with no makeup for transparency. Good product, helped plump the under eye. No irritation. Would recommend!

reviews.headline: Good!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It was really good. I apply before I apply my dave moisturizer and it adds a nice glow. The pump pushes out a little too much product so I tend to do a half pump. Overall good.

reviews.headline: Really Working!!!
reviews.comments: At 43 my eyes need all the help they can get. After a couple week I can see the difference. Cream goes on smooth with no greasy feeling. Packaging makes it easy to apply. No hard scents. Will keep on using.It's really working!

reviews.headline: Feels great on the face
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cream feels nice. It's lightweight. I think it's cute packaging. Not an overwhelming scent. Doesn't make me break out or have irritation. I didn't notice much plumping though. But still nice. I'll probably keep using it.

reviews.headline: This product works!
reviews.comments: At 43 my eyes need all the help they can get. After a couple week I can see the difference. Cream goes on smooth with no greasy feeling. Packaging makes it easy to apply. No hard scents. Will keep on using.

reviews.headline: ♡♡♡LoVely♡♡♡
reviews.comments: This eye cream is a game-changer! It instantly plumps and hydrates the delicate skin around my eyes, making fine lines less visible. My under-eye area looks smoother, brighter, and more youthful. It absorbs quickly without feeling greasy. I've noticed a real difference in just a few days. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a refreshed, revitalized look!

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Wonderful product ! Truly made a difference in my skin care routine! Also I love trying to get new products!  I truly enjoyed the texture of the productive and how simple it was to apply it addition to my other products

reviews.headline: Weightless hydration
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This product applies so easily a little goes a long way. It handles well under makeup. The packaging is easy to use. I didn't smell any scent. It has key ingredients like hyaluronic acid perfect for hydrating the fine lines around your eyes.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm 35 years old and my around eye skin is very sensitive. Unfortunately I started to notice first fine lines. I understand that it's absolutely natural and normal process but anyway I need to help my skin to stay hydrated and firm.
I'm very picky about eye area creams and after trying so many, this one has become my new favourite. Use it twice a day - in the morning and in the evening.  I appreciate that this eye cream is fragrance free and formulated without parabens. I absolutely like airless  pump bottle which was designed to preserve the efficacy of the potent ingredients in this formula. On my opinion it's the best type of eye cream bottles. Watch the video and you'll see that this cream is not too thick, how quickly it absorbs and leaves my skin without any sticking feeling. This eye cream is wonderful and after applying my around eyes skin feels instantly hydrated and smoothed. 
Below is what manufacturer promises us :
You can achieve non-invasive, line-smoothing results right at home with this plumping formula featuring Hyaluronic Acid, which acts as a moisture sponge to attract water and hydrate at the skin's surface; Gluconolactone for brightening exfoliation; and nourishing antioxidants Vitamin C & E with Green Tea, Chamomile and Calendula Extract to soothe, moisturize, and defend against drying environmental aggressors.
Overall this is an absolutely high quality product, very effective on my skin type and I like its consistency.
faceoff_positive.headline: Feels great on my skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I'm always looking for great skincare, so I was excited to try out this eye cream! This one, though, while good, didn't wow me. For context, I have fair, sensitive skin as well as sensitivities to scents. 

THE PROS:
-solid ingredient list
-pump packaging 
-no detectable scent 
-hydrating 
-a small amount goes a long way

THE CONS:
-I exhibited mild discomfort for about 5 minutes after each application. Not sure if this was supposed to be a cooling sensation that so many eye creams try to do, but it wasn't comfortable for me. 
-it didn't absorb very easily for me. I had to keep working it into my skin for more time than I would have liked. 
-I haven't noticed any significant changes in my skin after 3 weeks of use. 

Overall, I think it's a good option if you don't have sensitive skin and you're looking for extra hydration under the eyes. 

I received this eye creams for free to test in exchange for my honest review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hydrating - Good not Great
